sentences.sContent: Thirdly, the paper illustrates the life cycle of agriculture VR&DO and discusses the operating mode of it on the basis of dynamic network indenture.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thirdly, the paper illustrates the life cycle of agriculture VR&DO and discusses the operating mode of it on the basis of dynamic network indenture.
sentences.sCn: 再次，论文阐述了农业虚拟研发组织的生命周期，并论述了基于动态网契约的农业虚拟研发组织的运行模式。

remMethod.val: 来自indent(v. 切割成锯齿状)， 原指古代师徒间分割成锯齿状的契约

words.tran: 犬牙交错的；受契约约束的；缩进排印的
缩进；切割成锯齿状（indent的过去分词）
以契约约束；签订契约（indenture的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a formal contract, especially in the past, between an apprentice and his master(= employer ), or the act of arranging this
